about_the_game:
GAME FEATURES



  • Play online with your friends.
  • Try to eliminate other players while dodging obstacles.
  • Get power-ups with each health pack.
  • Customize your character (more customization options coming soon).
  • Laugh with the hilarious physics when eliminating opponents or being eliminated.



BUT

  • No single player mode (maybe in the future).
  • Gamepad doesn't work yet. You can play with it in-game (not for menus), but it might not work as expected.

Note From The Developer



Hi everyone! I'm Darian, the creator of Crash & Bump, and I'm thrilled to introduce you to my video game. I was inspired by my love for shooter games but wanted to give it a different twist and thought that adding obstacles would be a fun way to do so, thus Crash & Bump was born.

The entire game has been made by me, and it has taken me over 2 years to develop it so far.

My goal with Crash & Bump is to offer a fun, action-packed gaming experience that puts your skills to the test. And with each new update, I am committed to improving and adding new features to make the gaming experience even more exciting.

If you decide to purchase a copy, I want to thank you in advance for your support, and I hope you enjoy the game as much as I enjoy creating it. Thank you for playing and being a part of the development process of Crash & Bump!
detailed_description:
GAME FEATURES



  • Play online with your friends.
  • Try to eliminate other players while dodging obstacles.
  • Get power-ups with each health pack.
  • Customize your character (more customization options coming soon).
  • Laugh with the hilarious physics when eliminating opponents or being eliminated.



BUT

  • No single player mode (maybe in the future).
  • Gamepad doesn't work yet. You can play with it in-game (not for menus), but it might not work as expected.

Note From The Developer



Hi everyone! I'm Darian, the creator of Crash & Bump, and I'm thrilled to introduce you to my video game. I was inspired by my love for shooter games but wanted to give it a different twist and thought that adding obstacles would be a fun way to do so, thus Crash & Bump was born.

The entire game has been made by me, and it has taken me over 2 years to develop it so far.

My goal with Crash & Bump is to offer a fun, action-packed gaming experience that puts your skills to the test. And with each new update, I am committed to improving and adding new features to make the gaming experience even more exciting.

If you decide to purchase a copy, I want to thank you in advance for your support, and I hope you enjoy the game as much as I enjoy creating it. Thank you for playing and being a part of the development process of Crash & Bump!
name: Crash & Bump

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 8.1 64bit +
  • Processor: Core 2 Duo 2.4 GHz or Althon X2 2.7 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: ATI or Nvidia graphics card with 512MB video ram or better and Shader Model 3.0+ support. (ATI Radeon 3870 or higher, Nvidia GeForce 8800 GT or higher)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-750, 2.67 GHz / AMD Phenom II X4 965, 3.4 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 560 / AMD Radeon HD 6950 or better with 768 MB+ of VRAM (DirectX 11 Compatible)
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

short_description: Crash & Bump is an online multiplayer shooter... mixed with obstacle courses! Eliminate your opponents while dodging the obstacles and take advantage of the power-ups to get the victory.
supported_languages: English, Spanish - Latin America, French, Italian, German, Simplified Chinese, Korean, Japanese, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Turkish, Arabic
